en_text: For 2 turns, increase ATK by 30% for each Enhanced Light Att. awakening skill on the team

jp_skill.name: この勝負、もろたで工藤!!!
jp_skill.raw_description: 2ターンの間、チーム内の光属性強化の 覚醒数に応じて攻撃力が上昇。

kr_skill.name: This match is mine, Kudo!
kr_skill.raw_description: ATK increases with the number of [Enhanced Light Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns

na_skill.name: This match is mine, Kudo!
na_skill.raw_description: ATK increases with the number of [Enhanced Light Att.] Awoken Skills in team for 2 turns
